attributes.action: think again sensibly about the ban of the Red Arrows at the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you ashamed of being British?
If so you really shouldnt be Prime Minister. You use the military and navy and airforce when you feel like it in Iraq and Afganistan but appear ashamed of them for the Olympics. Please stop the so called Politically correct being such fools.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
